simplesect.para: A vector representation of a 512-bit unsigned integer and a 128-bit carry-out.

simplesect.title: Detailed Description
simplesect.para:
A union of:
homogeneous aggregate of 640-bit unsigned integer.
struct of:
homogeneous aggregate of 512-bit unsigned integer.
vector representation of the carry out of 512-bit add.
The Carry out vector overlays the high-order 128-bits of the 640-bit vector.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: Useful for passing the carry-out of a 512-bit add into the carry-in of an extended add.
